trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage> class is a complete implementation for a component editor page that consists of an empty window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage>类是包含一个空窗口组件编辑器页的完整实现。

trans-unit.source: You can extend this page to add your own controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以扩展此页后，可以添加你自己的控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage> is used by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage> 由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates an example <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个示例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage>实现。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 关联的状态：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage" /> class.
Activates and displays the page.
Applies changes to all the components being edited.
This property is not relevant for this class.
<see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
Specifies whether the editor should apply its changes before it is deactivated.
<see langword="true" /> if the editor should apply its changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果编辑器应该应用其更改;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The standard implementation returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 标准的实现返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the component to edit.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> this page allows you to edit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />此页面允许您编辑。

trans-unit.source: Gets the creation parameters for the control.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that indicates the creation parameters for the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> ，该值指示控件的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 关联的状态：

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Deactivates and hides the page.
Increments the loading counter.

Each procedure that performs loading or initialization should first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A> method to indicate that it will load something before the editor can display the loaded editor page.
trans-unit.target: 执行加载或初始化每个过程首先应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A>方法，以指示，它将加载的内容之前编辑器可以显示加载的编辑器页。

trans-unit.source: When a loading procedure that called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A> completes, it should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ExitLoadingMode%2A> method to indicate that its part of the load process is completed.
trans-unit.target: 当调用的加载过程<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A>完成，则应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ExitLoadingMode%2A>方法，以指示已加载过程的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A> property is used as a counter to determine when loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A>属性用作计数器以确定何时完成加载。

trans-unit.source: A page is in loading mode if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A> property is non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 在加载模式，如果页处于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A>属性为非零。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the loading counter.

Each procedure that performs loading or initialization should first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A> method to indicate that it will load something before the editor can display the loaded editor page.
trans-unit.target: 执行加载或初始化每个过程首先应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A>方法，以指示，它将加载的内容之前编辑器可以显示加载的编辑器页。

trans-unit.source: When a loading procedure that called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A> completes, it should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ExitLoadingMode%2A> method to indicate that its part of the load process is completed.
trans-unit.target: 当调用的加载过程<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A>完成，则应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ExitLoadingMode%2A>方法，以指示已加载过程的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A> property is used as a counter to determine when loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A>属性用作计数器以确定何时完成加载。

trans-unit.source: A page is in loading mode if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A> property is non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 在加载模式，如果页处于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A>属性为非零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is being activated for the first time.
<see langword="true" /> if the page has not previously been activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果以前尚未激活页;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that represents the window for this page.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that represents the window for this page.
Gets the component that is to be edited.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> that is to be edited.
Gets or sets the icon for the page.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> used to represent the page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />用于表示页。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the page is being activated for the first time.
<see langword="true" /> if this is the first time the page is being activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets a value indicating whether the page is being loaded.
<see langword="true" /> if the page is being loaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The message to process.
Processes messages that could be handled by the page.
<see langword="true" /> if the page processed the message; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This method gives the page a chance to process messages before the caller uses them.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使页面有机会处理消息之前调用方使用它们。

trans-unit.source: If this returns `true`, the message will be consumed; otherwise, the caller will continue to process the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`true`，消息将使用，否则为调用方将继续处理消息。

trans-unit.source: Loads the component into the page user interface (UI).
Each page must override this method and implement its own custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 每一页必须重写此方法，并实现其自己的自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: Indicates how many load dependencies remain until loading has been completed.
The number of remaining load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 其余的负载依赖关系的数量。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to track the number of loading stages remaining.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于跟踪剩余的加载阶段数。

trans-unit.source: For each process needed to completely load the document, this counter is incremented before loading begins, and decremented when each loading process completes.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个完全加载文档所需的进程，此计数器即会递增之前加载开始，并减少每个加载进程完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a component must be loaded before editing can occur.
<see langword="true" /> if a component must be loaded before editing can occur; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果必须加载组件，然后才能进行编辑。否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Called when the page and any sibling pages have applied their changes.
Gets or sets the page site.
The page site.
trans-unit.target: 网页的网站。

trans-unit.source: The site for this component editor page.
trans-unit.target: 此组件编辑器页的站点。

trans-unit.source: Reloads the component for the page.
This method is called when the current component may have changed elsewhere and needs to be reloaded into the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用时当前组件可能已更改在其他位置，并且需要重新加载到的用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: Saves the component from the page user interface (UI).
Each page must override this method and implement its own custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 每一页必须重写此方法，并实现其自己的自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to be edited.
Sets the component to be edited.
Sets the page as changed since the last load or save.
The site for this page.
Sets the site for this page.
Shows Help information if the page supports Help information.
This is only called if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.SupportsHelp%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 这只有当调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.SupportsHelp%2A>返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The Help system calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ShowHelp%2A> method to provide Help for the page.
trans-unit.target: 帮助系统调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ShowHelp%2A>方法以提供帮助页。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ShowHelp%2A> is usually called in response to F1 or when the Help button is clicked to allow the page to bring up its associated Help topic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ShowHelp%2A> 通常响应 F1 或单击帮助按钮以允许页后，可以显示其关联的帮助主题时调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the editor supports Help.
<see langword="true" /> if the editor supports Help; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The default implementation returns <see langword="false" />.
Gets the title of the page.
The title of the page.
trans-unit.target: 页的标题。

trans-unit.source: The caller may use this to show the name of this editor before it's actually activated.
trans-unit.target: 调用方可能会使用它来实际被激活之前显示此编辑器的名称。
